Imports

boxy/blends, boxy/blurs, boxy/buffers, boxy/shaders, boxy/spreads, boxy/textures

Types

Boxy = ref object
  atlasTexture*, tmpTexture: Texture
  ## Index into layer textures for writing.
  ## Layers array for pushing and popping.
  ## Size x size dimensions of the atlas.
  ## Number of quads drawn so far in this batch.
  ## Max quads in a batch before issuing an OpenGL call.
  ## The current matrix.
  ## The matrix stack.
  ## Entries used but not flushed yet.
  ## Flag for if the tile is taken or not.
  ## Dimensions of the window frame.
Source   Edit   
BoxyError = object of ValueError

proc getImage(boxy: Boxy; bounds: Rect): Image {.
    ...raises: [BoxyError, PixieError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Gets an Image rectangle from the current layer. Note: This is very costly because it transfers GPU data to CPU. It's not recommended to use this in a game loop. Source   Edit
